about_the_game:
Overview
Immerse yourself in this short, yet compelling 2D pixel art adventure in Central Killing Agency. As an agent of the compromised Central Killing Agency, your mission is to eliminate lead scientist Fred Olsen, navigating branching dialogues to shape your fate.

Key Features
  • Setting: It takes place in a 1950's hotel and is a 2D pixel art game.
  • Short & Sweet: Experience a compact yet impactful narrative-driven experience.
  • Branching Dialogue: Navigate the various dialogue options to unlock the alternative endings.
  • Alternate Endings: Explore the various alternate endings to the game.
  • Engaging Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the captivating musical score.

Attributions
German translation by Yustin Ogrodowski

content_descriptors.notes: There is pixel art blood and references to suicide.

detailed_description:
Overview
Immerse yourself in this short, yet compelling 2D pixel art adventure in Central Killing Agency. As an agent of the compromised Central Killing Agency, your mission is to eliminate lead scientist Fred Olsen, navigating branching dialogues to shape your fate.

Key Features
  • Setting: It takes place in a 1950's hotel and is a 2D pixel art game.
  • Short & Sweet: Experience a compact yet impactful narrative-driven experience.
  • Branching Dialogue: Navigate the various dialogue options to unlock the alternative endings.
  • Alternate Endings: Explore the various alternate endings to the game.
  • Engaging Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the captivating musical score.

Attributions
German translation by Yustin Ogrodowski

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: Central Killing Agency

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this 2d pixel art game, it's 1953 and you're playing as an agent hired by the Central Killing Agency to kill Fred Olsen. Experience multiple endings in this short, narrative-driven adventure.
